laboratory_examinations.findings: Immediate improvement after the first treatment; by the sixth ECT on hospital day 30, the patient was euthymic and free of psychotic symptoms.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressed positively, with rapid improvement over the course of treatment.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Symptoms resolved entirely after four treatments.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressed positively, with symptom resolution after ECT.
